mapper.select: /*com.ncomz.nms.dao.admin.organization.OrganizationMapper.selectOrg*/ SELECT A.DTL_CD_DESC, E.DTL_CD_DESC AS TEAM, U.USR_NM , U.EMP_NO, E2.DTL_CD_DESC AS RANK, IF (CHAR_LENGTH(CELL_NO)=11, concat( left(U.CELL_NO,3), '-', mid(U.CELL_NO,4,4), '-', right(U.CELL_NO,4) ), concat( left(U.CELL_NO,3), '-', mid(U.CELL_NO,4,3), '-', right(U.CELL_NO,4) )) as CELL_NO FROM T_USER U, T_COMMON_CODE A, T_COM_INFO CO LEFT OUTER JOIN T_COMMON_CODE E ON CO.TEAM_CD = E.DTL_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN T_COMMON_CODE E2 ON CO.PSIT_CD = E2.DTL_CD WHERE CO.EMP_NO = U.EMP_NO AND U.USE_YN = 'Y' AND CO.DEPT_CD = A.DTL_CD AND NOT CO.PSIT_CD = '210' AND NOT CO.PSIT_CD = '220' AND NOT CO.PSIT_CD = '230' AND U.EMP_NO NOT IN ('ADMIN') ORDER BY E2.ALGN_ORD , U.EMP_NO

/*com.ncomz.nms.dao.admin.organization.OrganizationMapper.selectHonor*/ SELECT E3.DTL_CD, U.USR_NM , A.DTL_CD_DESC, E2.DTL_CD_DESC AS RANK, E3.DTL_CD_DESC AS PSRT, IF (CHAR_LENGTH(CELL_NO)=11, concat( left(U.CELL_NO,3), '-', mid(U.CELL_NO,4,4), '-', right(U.CELL_NO,4) ), concat( left(U.CELL_NO,3), '-', mid(U.CELL_NO,4,3), '-', right(U.CELL_NO,4) )) as CELL_NO FROM T_USER U, T_COMMON_CODE A, T_COM_INFO CO LEFT OUTER JOIN T_COMMON_CODE E ON CO.TEAM_CD = E.DTL_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN T_COMMON_CODE E2 ON CO.RANK_CD = E2.DTL_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN T_COMMON_CODE E3 ON CO.PSIT_CD = E3.DTL_CD WHERE CO.EMP_NO = U.EMP_NO AND U.USE_YN = 'Y' AND CO.DEPT_CD = A.DTL_CD AND CO.PSIT_CD <= '230' AND CO.PSIT_CD >= '220' AND U.EMP_NO NOT IN ('ADMIN') ORDER BY A.ALGN_ORD

/*com.ncomz.nms.dao.admin.organization.OrganizationMapper.getCeo*/ SELECT E3.DTL_CD, U.USR_NM , A.DTL_CD_DESC, E2.DTL_CD_DESC AS RANK, E3.DTL_CD_DESC AS PSRT, IF (CHAR_LENGTH(CELL_NO)=11, concat( left(U.CELL_NO,3), '-', mid(U.CELL_NO,4,4), '-', right(U.CELL_NO,4) ), concat( left(U.CELL_NO,3), '-', mid(U.CELL_NO,4,3), '-', right(U.CELL_NO,4) )) as CELL_NO FROM T_USER U, T_COMMON_CODE A, T_COM_INFO CO LEFT OUTER JOIN T_COMMON_CODE E ON CO.TEAM_CD = E.DTL_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN T_COMMON_CODE E2 ON CO.RANK_CD = E2.DTL_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN T_COMMON_CODE E3 ON CO.PSIT_CD = E3.DTL_CD WHERE CO.EMP_NO = U.EMP_NO AND U.USE_YN = 'Y' AND CO.DEPT_CD = A.DTL_CD AND CO.PSIT_CD = '210' AND U.EMP_NO NOT IN ('ADMIN') ORDER BY A.ALGN_ORD

/*com.ncomz.nms.dao.admin.organization.OrganizationMapper.getDept*/ SELECT DISTINCT DTL_CD_DESC AS DEPT, DTL_CD FROM T_COMMON_CODE WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND GRP_CD = '100' AND ALGN_ORD > 2 ORDER BY ALGN_ORD

/*com.ncomz.nms.dao.admin.organization.OrganizationMapper.getTeam*/ SELECT A.DTL_CD_DESC AS GRP_CD_DESC, B.DTL_CD_DESC FROM T_COMMON_CODE A LEFT OUTER JOIN T_COMMON_CODE B ON A.DTL_CD = B.GRP_CD WHERE A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.GRP_CD = 100

/*com.ncomz.nms.dao.admin.organization.OrganizationMapper.teamCount*/ SELECT COUNT(*) AS T_COUNT, E.DTL_CD_DESC FROM T_COM_INFO CO LEFT OUTER JOIN T_USER U ON CO.EMP_NO = U.EMP_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN T_COMMON_CODE E ON CO.TEAM_CD = E.DTL_CD WHERE U.USE_YN = 'Y' AND E.DTL_CD_DESC IS NOT NULL GROUP BY E.DTL_CD_DESC

/*com.ncomz.nms.dao.admin.organization.OrganizationMapper.deptCount*/ SELECT COUNT(*) AS D_COUNT, DEPT_CD FROM T_COM_INFO CO LEFT OUTER JOIN T_USER U ON CO.EMP_NO = U.EMP_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN T_COMMON_CODE E ON CO.DEPT_CD = E.DTL_CD WHERE U.USE_YN = 'Y' GROUP BY DEPT_CD
